attributes.action: scrap routine spying on the whole population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Europeans should know better. There are plenty of horrific examples of surveillance gone wrong in Europe's modern history.

Terrorists may attack the open society, but only governments can abolish it.

The routine surveillance of all internet traffic (even if full content is not kept) is a step too far, and allowing anything other than courts to be allowed access to this database is wrong in a truly free society. We ask the PM to scrap all such plans, and to protect, rather than abolish, our freedom.
